title: Solar Panel Cleaning & Inspection
description: Perform a routine cleaning and inspection of a solar panel array.

steps.instruction: First, ensure safety before starting any work. What should you do?
steps.expected_action: Turn off the system / Disconnect power
steps.success_feedback: Correct! Always disconnect the system to prevent electrical shock.
steps.failure_feedback: Incorrect. Safety first! You must disconnect the power source.

steps.instruction: Now that the system is off, inspect the panels. You see a layer of dust. How do you clean it?
steps.expected_action: Use water and a soft brush
steps.success_feedback: Good. Using water and a soft brush prevents scratching the glass.
steps.failure_feedback: Avoid abrasive materials or harsh chemicals. Use water and a soft brush.
